entry.title: Wheel of Time Exclusive Casting leak! Faile Bashere joins the cast!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Exclusive Casting leak! Faile Bashere joins the cast!
media:group.media:description:
Wheel of Time Season 3 Exclusive! WoTUp has acquired information on the actress who will be playing Faile Bashere!! Isabella Bucceri has been spotted on the Two Rivers set and information has been provided to WoTUp! That she will be playing the iconic role of Faile! I for one am excited as Faile is my second favorite character in the series and I cannot wait to see how she plays this Character in Season 3 of the show! Join me for this Wheel of Time WoTUp! Exclusive!
Isabellas IMDB https://www.imdb.com/name/nm10796484/

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 3 Exclusive! Ispan Sedai's actress revealed! Cast leak!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 3 Exclusive! Ispan Sedai's actress revealed! Cast leak!
media:group.media:description:
Wheel of Time Season 3 Exclusive! WoTUp has aquired information on the actress who will be playing Ispan Shefar! Olumide Olorunfemi is joining the cast in Season 3 as this very important member of the Blue Ajah! Season 2 is just a few short weeks away and we will have all of the Wheel of Time content we can handle but that doesn't mean leaks and information about Season 3 stop! Join me for this Wheel of Time WoTUp! exclusive!

entry.title: Wheel of Time News roundup! Season 2 Article! New Wheel of Time Tabletop game! Trollocs! Fan merch!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time News roundup! Season 2 Article! New Wheel of Time Tabletop game! Trollocs! Fan merch!
media:group.media:description:
Wheel of Time news roundup! We talk about Trollocs, A new SFX article about Wheel of Time Season 2, and a new Wheel of Time Tabletop game coming in 2024! We are so close to Season 2 of The Wheel of Time we can expect to start seeing more official news drops, including articles like the SFX one that give us tidbits about the Second Season! We also feature WoT Patterns a new Wheel of Time Etsy Shop that sells some awesome Wheel of Time merchandise! This is not one to miss!!
SHELLY SEDAIS ETSY SHOP!!!! (Cool Shadowboxes, Mugs, stickers and so much more!)
https://www.etsy.com/shop/WOTPatterns
Trolloc Twitter Video https://twitter.com/TheWheelOfTime/status/1689313087130673154?s=20

entry.title: New Wheel of Time Season 2 Teaser! Episode count on release! High Lady Suroth speaks!

media:group.media:title: New Wheel of Time Season 2 Teaser! Episode count on release! High Lady Suroth speaks!
media:group.media:description:
A new Wheel of Time teaser! We get to see some new shots from Season 2 of The Wheel of Time as well as actually hear High Lady Suroth Speak. Chills. Does she have a Texan accent? Not quite but it is American! We also found out how many episodes will be dropping on September 1st when Season 2 comes out, we get 3! Join me as we break down this tyeaser and talk about the new tidbits we say today on Wheel of Time Wednesday!

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer Things I missed! or got wrong!!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer Things I missed! or got wrong!!
media:group.media:description:
Wheel of Time Season 2 is only a few short weeks away, we had our trailer drop not too long ago and I did do a trailer breakdown video for it (over an hour long!!) but that doesn't mean that ever piece of Wheel of Time news I included and every theory was right, I got a few things wrong and I missed a few things as well! So join me as I dive back into the trailer and coprrect some of my mistakes and add some new things I missed!!

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 2 preview clip! The DarkFriend Social breakdown!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 2 preview clip! The DarkFriend Social breakdown!
media:group.media:description:
The Wheel of Time released a new scene at the end of Episode 8! We now have a sneak peek at Season 2 of The Wheel of Time in a new clip that depicts the Darkfriend Social! There is a ton to unpack from this scene, from where the Darkfriend Social takes place (not where you think!) to who attends and how they are making the Antagonists of the show a little more relatable than in the books! Either way I'm really excited to break down this new Season 2 sneak peek of The Wheel of Time!!!
Rob from WWN https://linktr.ee/Weeklywheelnews
Marcus Hongs Tweet:

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Costume Sketches WoTWednesday reveal!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Costume Sketches WoTWednesday reveal!
media:group.media:description:
Happy Wheel of Time Wednesday! Being it's the first WoTWednesdayt after the Season 2 trailer drop we were not sure what to expect, and we were not disappointed! Nerdist came through with an official Wheel of Time release for WoTWednesday of some sketches of the costumes for Season 2! We get to see Siuan Sedai, Moiraine Sedai, High Lady Suroth and a Damane (with the a'dam!) join me as I dive into these images and geek out over the literal days long countdown to Season 2!!!
Nerdist Article:
https://nerdist.com/article/wheel-of-time-season-2-costume-sketches-seanchan-siuan-moiraine-costume-designer-sharon-gilham/?utm_campaign=social+flow&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social

entry.title: More Wheel of Time Season 2 characters revealed! Jessica Boone is Alwhin!

media:group.media:title: More Wheel of Time Season 2 characters revealed! Jessica Boone is Alwhin!
media:group.media:description:
More Wheel of Time castings? Its been a banner week of Season 2 and 3 of The Wheel of Time! We got a few high profile castings this week and it continues with the reveal that Jessica Boone is playing Alwhin, High Lady Suroths voice. Join me as I detail Jessica's career and credentials as well as who Alwhin is and how they may fit into Season 2 and beyond of The Wheel of Time!
Prague Shakespeare Company https://pragueshakespeare.com/
If you are looking for a worthy cause to support look no further than the Prague Shakespeare company of which Jessica is a part of! Donate what you can to assist this institution that supports so many actors and actresses!
SUPPORT THEM!!! DONATE HERE!!! https://pragueshakespeare.com/support-psc.html

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 2 and 3 castings! Ryma Sedai and Galad Trakand

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 2 and 3 castings! Ryma Sedai and Galad Trakand
media:group.media:description:
More Wheel of Time Casting! One of them is for both Season 2 and 3 and is an actress already known to the fandom, Nyokabi Gethaiga. WotSeries.com has uncovered her role in the show and I discuss how she may fit into both seasons. The second casting is Callum Kerr, a self proclaimed country music star as Galad Trakand, no that is not a typo his CV lists him as a Trakand and there are a few theories as to why this is. I put at least one of them to rest in this video so make sure you join in!
WOTSERIES Article:
https://www.wotseries.com/2023/07/21/scoop-the-wheel-of-time-casts-iconic-character/

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer BREAKDOWN!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer BREAKDOWN!
media:group.media:description:
The Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer has dropped!! Of course I had to do a HUGE Wheel of Time breakdown!! Join me as I break down all of the easter eggs and notable moments from the Trailer. Yes this is a LONG Wheel of Time video, but there is just so much to unpack! We see our first glimpse of Lanfear, the Seanchan in all of their terrible glory, Rand channeling, the accepted test. There is just too much Wheel of Time goodness to go around!!!! Season 2 is just a few short weeks away!!!!
There is a pinned comment that has all of the corrections as we get new information! reply to that for any mistake I make! (or just add it below )

entry.title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer date released! Is Wheel of Time still filming Season 3?

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer date released! Is Wheel of Time still filming Season 3?
media:group.media:description:
Wheel of Time Season 2 Trailer is THIS WEEK! We now have a date and a time for the trailer! We also have some promotional images released when they announced this, two that we have seen similar ones to before and one brand new one featuring Madelyn Madden and Ceara Coveney! Also The Wheel of Time Twitter account did a thing! We had sort of a fan centric marketing campaign this evening with some pictures of the horn of Valere coming out of a box opened by High Lord Turak! We chat about that, then we discuss is The Wheel of Time still on set? Are they filming even though SAG and WGA are on strike? I have those answers for you today!
Kevins Twitter
@GradeKangusBeef
Nerdist Article: https://nerdist.com/article/wheel-of-time-season-2-trailer-preview-images-egwene-elayne-perrin-lan/

entry.title: New Wheel of Time Season 2 Clip! SAG AND WGA on strike! What does this mean for WoT?

media:group.media:title: New Wheel of Time Season 2 Clip! SAG AND WGA on strike! What does this mean for WoT?
media:group.media:description:
SAG and the WGA are both on Strike, and we get a new 3 second clip of The Wheel of Time! I break down the clip frame by frame and discuss some of the new stuff we saw in there as well as give my thoughts on where it fits into the Wheel of TimeSeason 2, and then I talk just a bit about the strikes. How will they effect The Wheel of Time, marketing, cast appearances? Filming? I speculate on what the next few days, weeks or months may look like.

entry.title: Brand New Wheel of Time Season 2 Poster Reveal! So many Easter Eggs!

media:group.media:title: Brand New Wheel of Time Season 2 Poster Reveal! So many Easter Eggs!
media:group.media:description:
The Wheel of Time has revealed its Season 2 poster! It does not disappoint (unlike the ... interesting ... one we got for Season 1!) It has a ton of little Easter Eggs in it and I try my best to cover them all from Perrins Hammer, to the absolute gorgeous weaves around some of the characters, Rands shaved head and Rosamund Pike wielding a knife like she means to use it on any Shadowspawn nearby! I also give a little update on my hopes for SDCC and what we may get in light of the possible SAG strike that may become official in a few hours. Join me for some Wheel of Time Easter Egg hunting fun!

entry.title: Wheel of Time Animated movie The White Tower!!!

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time Animated movie The White Tower!!!
media:group.media:description:
The Wheel of Time is coming to an animated screen near you! Yes you heard it right we are getting an Animated Feature length film set in The World of The Wheel of Time. Coming from IWOT productions and Squeeze animation we are going to see a brand new film set before the events of the popular Prime Video Show and it is Titled The White Tower. It follows a young girl and the trials and tribulations of becoming a Novice in the White Tower! I give all the details we know so far!!!
Squeeze Animation Studio: https://www.squeezestudio.com/

entry.title: Wheel of Time and San Diego Comic Con 2023

media:group.media:title: Wheel of Time and San Diego Comic Con 2023
media:group.media:description:
Is Wheel of Time attending the San Diego Comic Con? Maybe? We don't have official confirmation just yet but we have some speculation that we may see our favorite fantasy series show up there in a panel. However, recently Variety is reporting a ton of big companies are pulling out of SDCC over the Writers strike, and I have a little info from one of my sources as well about what is possible for Amazon and The Wheel of Time. There is still hope! Also thank you for 2.5 million views! Both myself and Mat Hatch from The Dusty Wheel have hit that milestone around the same time so we are celebrating together this Wednesday on The Dusty Wheel!
Variety Article:
https://variety.com/2023/tv/news/comic-con-schedule-marvel-netflix-hbo-sony-universal-skipping-1235653256/
Dusty Wheel:
